title: EE unveils the Robin, a new 4G tablet for kids
text:
EE unveils the Robin, a new 4G tablet for kids 
Published By: AndroidCentral.com - Today 
EE has unveiled a new tablet called the Robin. This new product will enable kids to access content online, utilizing the 4G connectivity. Wh...
